page.title: 12Buses.Lparish H.Priors
page.content: The public transport in the D-Block is provided by Hampshire Bus.Lparish is served by Service 275,Andover to Basingstoke.The route follows the A303 into Lparish to H.Priors. There are 7 buses daily, Mon.to Sat.to Andover and 6 to Basingstoke.Travel time 30 mins and 1hr.respectively. .H.Priors is served by Service 275 & 276.The 276 has 10 buses daily to Andover(journey 15 mins.,)and 8 to Basingstoke(journey 45 mins.) with an afternoon Sunday service. From a questionnaire we found that 43% of those asked used the buses but only a week or less frequently. People told us they considered the fares expensive and the times inconvenient, especially the evening ones.
